ValidationRule.description: Complex Loss cannot be unchecked once it has been checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', Complex_Loss__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED ( Complex_Loss__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Won'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Lost'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Work Complete'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Billing Complete'), NOT(ISBLANK(Last_NCLS_Approval_Date_and_Time__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complex Loss cannot be unchecked if Job has been NCLS Approved, Won or Lost or Completed.
